backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing a workshop management backend with access-controlled endpoints for user profiles, inventory, service records, customers, and transactions using a mixin authorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the admin login fix feature to its relevant source files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of every page, component, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for a neutral light/dark color theme used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Workshop POS React app, mounting the app at the `#root` div and loading the Vite entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient, AuthProvider, and a TanStack Router with three routes (POS, Products, History), conditionally rendering LoginPage when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/customer/Custome: Dialog modal for creating or editing a customer record, including fields for name, phone, discount settings, and a dynamic vehicle history list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainNav.t: Sticky navigation header with desktop nav links, a mobile menu toggle, shop logo/name from settings, and a user avatar dropdown with logout.
frontend/src/components/pos/CartLineItem: Stub no-op component retained only to prevent import errors; the actual cart UI was replaced by TransactionPage.
frontend/src/components/pos/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar component for the POS app with links to POS, Products, and History pages, plus a logout button and current user display.
frontend/src/components/transaction/Rece: Print-friendly receipt component that renders shop info, transaction details, cart items, and total using shop settings and IDR formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous), initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication context and hook providing login/logout, user management (add/delete/update), and localStorage-backed session persistence with a default admin user.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Stub currency hook that provides IDR formatting utilities for compatibility with legacy code.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: React Query hooks for customer CRUD operations (get all, search by name, upsert, delete) via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: React Query hooks for inventory item management (get all, add/update, delete) via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the old draft persistence system; exposes no-op saveDraft and checkout functions for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the old POS draft system; returns a default draft state and no-op action functions to prevent import errors in legacy files.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Stub hook replacing the old products system; returns empty data and no-op functions for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on inventory items, transactions, and service records, using the ICP actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReports.ts: Exports a single React Query hook that fetches a profit/loss report from the backend actor for a given date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useService.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the service queue, all service records, adding records, and updating service status.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopSettings.ts: Manages shop settings (name, address, phone, logo, greeting) with localStorage persistence and a React state hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransaction.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all transactions and adding a new transaction via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Stub hook that returns empty data, replacing the old transactions hook superseded by useTransaction.ts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and a warm amber/ochre CSS custom property theme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDataPage.tsx: Customer management page supporting search, add/edit/delete, WhatsApp links, and Excel import/export of customer records.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by ReportsPage in the new system.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with a searchable table, add/edit/delete dialog, and Excel import/export for inventory items.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login form page that authenticates users via useAuth hook, displaying username/password fields and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by TransactionPage in the new system.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Stub page that renders nothing, replaced by InventoryPage in the new system.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Profit/loss report page that aggregates all transactions into revenue, COGS, and gross profit summaries with itemized sales breakdown, date range filtering (client-side), and print support.
frontend/src/pages/ServicePage.tsx: Service management page that displays the repair queue and provides a form to add new service records, with status toggling (masuk/selesai) and navigation to the POS page on completion.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shop settings page allowing users to configure logo, name, address, phone, and greeting message, with all data persisted to localStorage via the useShopSettings hook.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionPage.tsx: POS/checkout page with customer autocomplete, cart management (add/remove/update items), transaction submission, and receipt printing via window.print().
frontend/src/pages/UserDataPage.tsx: User management page that lists all workshop users and supports adding new users, deleting existing ones, and uploading profile photos, all stored in localStorage via the useAuth hook.
frontend/src/utils/excelUtils.ts: Provides CSV import/export utility functions for inventory and customer data, including CSV parsing, escaping, and file download helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and hash cleanup support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording a single existing fix feature targeting broken admin login authentication in useAuth.ts and LoginPage.tsx.
